A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Huge plot holes. Characters used to push the run time\, weird decisions. Why is Holdo there? WTF happened to Luke? Where are the knights of Ren? Snoke? What is Rose doing there? Why are they making captain Phasma so useless? VERTICAL BOMBING IN SPACE? Porgs\, porgs porgs and other merch\, oh i mean porgs. CGI is amazing\, apart from the times when its not... and then it looks really bad.
